Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.table

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.table.Island
public class Island extends Object
An island, it could contain students of different colors, towers of the same color, Mother Nature's pawn and, if the game is played in expert mode, one "no entry" tile

    • setWeight

      public void setWeight(int weight)
      Sets the new weight of this island.
      Parameters:
      weight - the new weight of this island, the minimum is 1 and the maximum is 8.

    • getWeight

      public int getWeight()
      Gets the number of islands merged with this island, the minimum is 1 when no other island are merged with it and the maximum is 8.
      Returns:
      the number of islands merged.

      the number of students of the specified color present on this island.

    • countAll

      public Integer[] countAll()
      Counts the number of students of each color present on this island.
      Returns:
      the array, ordered by PawnColor's index, where each cell contains the number of students of each color present on this island.
